choiceresponse.label: What must a learner have to experience hands-on training in Virtual Labs?

checkboxgroup.choice: A gaming/dev 'power' machine Gaming machines are welcome, but not at all required.
20GB of available hard drive space No, we let you keep your hard drive space.
Your software installed on their machine Oh the headaches of installing local software - no need with Virtual labs!
A web browser Yep, a web browser is all you need. Ah, the simplicity.
